Text: Does it create bootable USB (I dont use disks anymore) like the Win 7 USB-DVD tool?

For some reason, this isn't doing anything for me. Followed the instructions, let it run its course, and it said it was finished creating the .iso. Went to the folder I had selected for it to go to and it's empty. Ran it again, same results. I'm not getting any errors or anything, either.
